item.title: C# like events in C++ - second approach
item.description: Hi Everyone ! About year ago I try to implement events for 2DXngine. Right now when I try to implement game I realize that this implementation is insufficient for my current needs. Previous events need to store binding in order to unsubscribe, use macro to create bindings and so on. This â€¦
